title: june 24: picasso’s first show
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the first art show by Pablo Picasso. After, she talks about Beyonce’s debut solo album. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
